about_the_game:
Battle efficiently with infinite Kinfolk! Infinikin is a run-based monster battling randomizer with attacks that permanently run out. Use your resources carefully to cultivate a team across multiple runs. Unlock new upgrades, train your favorite Kinfolk, and defeat corrupted creatures known as Infinikin.


Your Unique Kinfolk
A complete pool of Kinfolk is generated when you begin a new save. Some are straightforward attackers, while others support their allies or rely on powerful combinations of moves. Learn their strengths across multiple runs to discover your ideal team.


Limited Resources
Each move has limited uses, but non-damaging effects and passive abilities help make the most of every attack. Will you stick with a few Kinfolk to use up all of their moves, or will you recruit defeated Kinfolk mid-run?


Adapt and Plan!
Send your Kinfolk back to base to train for future runs. Exhausted moves grant stat boosts, and defeated opponents unlock upgrades to customize your Kinfolk further. Assemble powerful Kinfolk to cycle onto your team as you reach for the top of the Infinikin Factory!
